text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist and haze in the morning. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 5 easterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
